abstract: Many Republicans are urging Chris Christie to run for president, but some on the right of the party are less enthusiastic.
snippet: Many Republicans are urging Chris Christie to run for president, but some on the right of the party are less enthusiastic.
lead_paragraph: As Chris Christie makes up his mind about whether to run for president, he is no doubt listening to the effusive praise from donors and activists and leading Republicans.

headline.main: Christie Faces Conservative Criticism as He Decides on Run
